solution_line_template: December has {december_days} days, January has {january_days} days and February has {february_days} days for a total of {december_days}+{january_days}+{february_days} = <<{december_days}+{january_days}+{february_days}={total_days}>>{total_days} days

He feeds them {morning_feed} cup in the morning and {afternoon_feed} cup in the afternoon for a total of {morning_feed}+{afternoon_feed} = <<{morning_feed}+{afternoon_feed}={cups_per_day}>>{cups_per_day} cup per day
If he feeds them {cups_per_day} cup per day for {total_days} days then he will need {cups_per_day}*{total_days} = <<{cups_per_day}*{total_days}={total_cups}>>{total_cups} cups of birdseed
